data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,476,100 people living in the county of Bagerhat.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bagerhat, Khulna, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Bagerhat, Khulna, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 1,849 believers in the county of Bagerhat the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 1,849 believers in Bagerhat, Khulna, Bangladesh a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Namassej (Hindu traditions) people. Make the Namassej (Hindu traditions) people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Bagerhat, Khulna, Bangladesh to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Bagerhat, Khulna, Bangladesh to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Over 99.57 percent of the people of Bagerhat are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

location.name: Bagerhat
location.people_groups_list: Chitrakar (Muslim traditions), Ghazi, Bagdi (Hindu traditions), Peshakar, Mir
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chitrakar (Muslim traditions) (6,200), Ghazi (1,500), Bagdi (Hindu traditions) (2,879,000), Peshakar (1,500), Mir (49,000)
